data.event: It is further included in the larger Greenville-Spartanburg-Anderson, South Carolina Combined Statistical Area, with a total population of 1,266,995, at the 2010 census.
Anderson's spirit and quality of life have earned national recognition as Anderson County was named an "All-America City" in 2000.
